skillType.name: Jab
skillType.desc: Reduces effects that prevent damage by {x} when attacking.

skillType.name: Punch
skillType.desc: A random enemy {y} unit takes {x} damage.

skillType.name: Sturdy
skillType.desc: Blocks {x} damage when attacked.

skillType.name: Payback
skillType.desc: Deals {x} damage to any {y} card that attacks this.

skillType.name: Cripple
skillType.desc: Reduces attack of a random enemy {y} unit by {x} for a turn.

skillType.name: Cripple All
skillType.desc: Reduces attack of all enemy {y} units by {x} for a turn.

skillType.name: Gas
skillType.desc: Attacked enemy {y} card takes {x} additional damage each turn.

skillType.name: Shield
skillType.desc: Prevent {x} damage dealt to another random {y} card.

skillType.name: Shield All
skillType.desc: Prevent {x} damage dealt to other friendly {y} cards.

skillType.name: Boost
skillType.desc: Card gets +{x} attack whenever you play a combo.

skillType.name: Recover
skillType.desc: Gets +{x} max health whenever you play a combo

skillType.name: Cheer
skillType.desc: Increases attack of a random friendly {y} unit by {x} for a turn.

skillType.name: Cheer All
skillType.desc: Increases attack of all friendly {y} units by {x} for a turn.

skillType.name: Heal
skillType.desc: Restore {x} health to a damaged {y} card.

skillType.name: Heal All
skillType.desc: Restore {x} health to all friendly damaged {y} cards.

skillType.name: Leech
skillType.desc: Heals self after dealing attack damage.

skillType.name: Motivate
skillType.desc: {y} cards adjacent to this get extra attack.

skillType.name: Bomb
skillType.desc: Deal {x} damage to {y} enemies adjacent to the one this attacks.

skillType.name: Crazed
skillType.desc: Gain {x} attack after dealing damage

skillType.name: Hijack
skillType.desc: Each time the opposing card would increase its attack, instead stop up to {x} increase and increase this card's attack by that amount for a turn.

skillType.name: Bodyguard
skillType.desc: Block {x} damage from skills to this card and adjacent cards passively. Uses the highest Bodyguard available.

skillType.name: Give
skillType.desc: Give a random card the {s} skill with {x} value.

skillType.name: Slow
skillType.desc: Card activates after {x} additional turns.
